page.title: 15FARMING
page.content: A typical farm in the Knighton area is Llanshay Farm which is owned by Mr.Philip Price.It is a farm of approximately 450 acres,31 acres are used to grow barley and 42 acres are used for growing hay.Grass is grown on a number of fields for silage and these fields and the remainder are used for grazing.The farm has five silage pits as there are a number of cattle to feed during the winter months.The farm specialises in rearing store cattle and sheep.Sheep have to be dipped to kill scab and lice and they have to be treated against scour which is caused by the sweetness of the grass.Sheep are sheared each year and the fleeces are sold.Treating the animals to prevent diseases takes up a great deal of the farmers time.He has to treat sheep for foot rot and many other ailments.
